lead_paragraph: When Joe Allen walked through the door at Liverpool football club his former manager Brendan Rodgers beamed at the waiting television cameras and confidently proclaimed: "This is the Welsh Xavi".

headline.print_headline: Allen Making a Name for Himself as a Wales Hero
headline.main: Allen Making a Name for Himself as a Wales Hero
